casebody.data:
L. B. MUMAW, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 5951. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Nov. 22, 1930. Mike E. Smith, of Port Worth, Tex. (Simpson, Collins & Moore, of Port Worth, Tex., on the brief), for appellant. Norman A. Dodge, Ú. S. Atty., and Morrow H. Boynton, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Port Worth, Tex.

Before BRYAN and POSTER, Circuit Judges, and HUTCHESON, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
